mapper.select: SELECT t.txn_hist_code , t.txn_date , t.txn_type , t.txn_memo , t.price , v.balance , t.bank , t.acct_no , t.com_id , t.txn_name FROM transaction t JOIN VW_TRANSACTION_LEDGER v ON t.txn_hist_code = v.txn_hist_code WHERE t.com_id = #{comId} ORDER BY t.txn_date DESC, t.txn_hist_code DESC

SELECT vdr_code AS vdrCode, type, vdr_name AS vdrName, biz_no AS bizNo, ceo_name AS ceoName, addr, addr_detail AS addrDetail, email, tel, bank, acct_no AS acctNo, credit_period AS creditPeriod, credit_price AS creditPrice, credit_bal_price AS creditBalPrice, discount, com_id AS comId, emp_id AS empId FROM vender WHERE com_id = #{comId} AND type = 'vt01'
AND vdr_code LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%'
AND vdr_name LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%'
AND addr LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%'
AND acct_no LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%'
ORDER BY vdr_code DESC
